SELECT A1.VAC_BNK_CD , ( SELECT A2.FNIT_NM FROM TB_RVDW_FNIT_CD A2 WHERE A2.FNIT_DV_CD = '1' AND A2.FNIT_CD = A1.VAC_BNK_CD ) VAC_BNK_NM , A1.VAC_NO , A1.ICHR_PRTNR_NO , A1.ICHR_PRTNR_NM , ( SELECT B2.DP_DTM FROM TB_RVDW_ITG_DP_BAS B2 WHERE B2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND B2.VAC_IS_ID = A1.VAC_IS_ID AND B2.KW_GRP_CO_CD = A1.KW_GRP_CO_CD ORDER BY B2.ITG_DP_NO DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROW ONLY ) FNL_DP_DTM , ( SELECT B2.DP_AMT FROM TB_RVDW_ITG_DP_BAS B2 WHERE B2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND B2.VAC_IS_ID = A1.VAC_IS_ID AND B2.KW_GRP_CO_CD = A1.KW_GRP_CO_CD ORDER BY B2.ITG_DP_NO DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROW ONLY ) FNL_DP_AMT , ( SELECT SUM(B2.DP_BLAM) FROM TB_RVDW_ITG_DP_BAS B2 WHERE B2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND B2.VAC_IS_ID = A1.VAC_IS_ID AND B2.KW_GRP_CO_CD = A1.KW_GRP_CO_CD ) TOT_DP_BLAM FROM TB_RVDW_VAC_BAS A1 WHERE A1.VAC_STAT_CD = '1' /*1-할당*/ AND A1.KW_GRP_CO_CD = '2000' /*2000 교원프라퍼티*/ AND A1.VAC_IS_DV_CD = '1' /*1 판매*/
AND A1.ICHR_PRTNR_NO = #{prtnrNo} /*조회조건*/
